pages.text: $(philo)this artifact is one of my personal favorites. using the minium stone at its core, the archangels smite transforms emc into physical projectiles; arrows imbued with alchemical power. these arrows will automatically change trajectory toward creatures close enough to it, inflicting a variety of effects upon impact with the target.

$(philo)simply mocking the movements of drawing a bow will fire a single arrow, but a wave of the hand will fire a volley of ten. additionally, pressing change mode will turn on a constant stream. do note that each arrow summoned costs 14 emc.
